Posts.Content: mfreeman wrote: Hello All I am new to this board and was wondering if anyone here has taken Raloxofene?  My oncologist put me on this in November and I am not so sure about it.  My sister died of a pulmonary embolism(blood clot) so my oncologist didn't put me on tamoxifen.  This medication is suppose to do the same thing as tamoxifen but we shall see.  I go back to Mayo on April 27 and my last mamogram showed microcalcifications in the same breast as my ADH.  I have NO family history of Breast Cancer but that doesn't seem to matter anymore.  If anyone else is taking Raloxofene please let me know how you are doing on it.  Thank you for your help ahead of time. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Raloxofene and ADH mfreeman awb
